hero.name: Jaime Villanueva
hero.title: Full Stack Web Developer
hero.description: Specialized in creating modern and scalable web experiences using the latest technologies

about.title: Get to know me!
about.description_p1: I'm Jaime Villanueva, a FullStack developer specialized in web design and development. My approach combines solid front-end experience to create attractive interfaces, with back-end skills to build functional and dynamic solutions.
about.description_p2: I offer complete solutions that include dynamic menus, management systems, ERPs, client areas, e-commerce and payment gateways. I also manage content for social media, improving companies' online visibility.
about.description_p3: My goal is to transform ideas into successful digital products. Explore my projects and contact me to take your vision to the next level.

projects.page_description: Welcome to my web development project portfolio! Each project showcases my skills, creativity and dedication to deliver quality web solutions.
